tool.name: Create.database
tool.description: creates a database file from a list, repnames, repfasta and contaxonomy file
tool.command:
echo 'create.database( #if $otu.is_of_type("mothur.list"): list=$otu #else shared=$otu #end if ,repfasta=$repfasta ,repname=$repname ,constaxonomy=$constaxonomy #if $label: ,label=$label #end if #if $group: ,group=$group #end if )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination prefix="$otu" && mv \${prefix%.dat}*.database "$database" && mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile"

param.name: otu
param.label: list or shared - OTU List of Shared

param.name: constaxonomy
param.label: constaxonomy - Consensus Taxonomy
param.help: consensus taxonomy file output by classify.otu

param.name: label
param.label: label - OTU Labels
param.help: Select exactly one label. If none selected, first label in your list or shared file will be used

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The create.database_ command reads a list_ or shared_ file, .cons.taxonomy, .rep.fasta, .rep.names and optional group file, and creates a database file.
.. _list: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/List_file .. _shared: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Shared_file .. _create.database: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Create.database
v.1.28.0: Updated to Mothur 1.33, added count paramter.
